title: My Own Human
description: Can a vampire learn to love a human?Adrianna never expected to meet the beautiful Heather, a young woman that loves fresh air, dances in the rain, and likes her heartbeat regular. Oh, and is as human as they come.Torn between her duty and her feelings, Adrianna struggles to find a place for the human girl in vampire society. In a cage or in her heart?â€”My Own Human is the first book in the completed Lesbian My Own Human Duology.
author: Arizona Tape
